name: The Villamar Firm PLLC
overview:
The Villamar Firm is a Professional Limited Liability Company (PLLC) law firm based in Virginia with easy access to the United States Patent and Trademark Office. The Villamar Firm specializes in the practice of Intellectual Property Law, including patents, trademarks, copyrights, trade secrets and computer and internet law.

We specialize in helping high-tech companies and universities protect their Intellectual Property in a most efficient manner.

Our unique strategies include minimizing all attorney time by remotely training company and university engineers in writing patent specifications for important technologies. With this strategy, we have clients that team up with us to file patent applications in cutting edge technologies with minimal costs, as compared to conventional methodologies.

We use similar strategies to minimize patent prosecution costs and obtain the highest quality patents for our clients, as quickly and as efficiently as possible. Our intent is to build a long term mutually beneficial relationship with all of our clients, and we look forward to the opportunity to do the same with you.
